00088 /* @brief Choose a stencil. */
00089 /*
00090  * Choose a stencil
00091  * @return void
00092  */
00093 void
00094 ScalarField::ChooseStencil( void ) {
00095   switch ( m_nstencil ) {
00096 
00097   case 3:
00098     m_pStencil1 = stencil3_1;
00099     m_pStencil2 = stencil3_2;
00100     break;
00101 
00102   case 5:
00103     m_pStencil1 = stencil5_1;
00104     m_pStencil2 = stencil5_2;
00105     break;
00106 
00107   case 7:
00108     m_pStencil1 = stencil7_1;
00109     m_pStencil2 = stencil7_2;
00110     break;
00111 
00112   case 9:
00113     m_pStencil1 = stencil9_1;
00114     m_pStencil2 = stencil9_2;
00115     break;
00116 
00117   case 11:
00118     m_pStencil1 = stencil11_1;
00119     m_pStencil2 = stencil11_2;
00120     break;
00121 
00122 
00123   default:
00124     std::cerr << " * * ERROR: unsupported finite difference scheme in ScalarField::ChooseStencil!" << std::endl;
00125     abort();
00126   }
00127 
00128 }

00130 /*
00131  * checks whether a file does exist
00132  * @param filename
00133  * @return bool true or false
00134  */
00135 bool DoesFileExist( char *filename ) {
00136   bool flag = false;
00137   std::fstream fin( filename, std::ios::in );
00138   if ( fin.is_open() )
00139     flag = true;
00140   fin.close();
00141 
00142   return flag;
00143 }

00145 /* @brief Put clound in cell */
00146 /*
00147  * Puts cloud in cell environment
00148  * @param npart number of particles
00149  * @param coord positions of particles
00150  * @param wpar mass ("weight") of particles
00151  */
00152 template < typename T >
00153 void ScalarField::put_CIC( unsigned npart, T *coord, float *wpar ) {
00154 
00155   unsigned ix, iy, iz, ix1, iy1, iz1;
00156   float x, y, z;
00157   float dx, dy, dz, dyw;
00158   float tx, ty, tz, tyw;
00159 
00160   static bool bInitialized( false );
00161 
00162   if ( !bInitialized ) {
00163     bInitialized = true;
00164     std::cout << " * * initializing density field with -1...";
00165     for ( ix = 0; ix < m_nx; ++ix )
00166       for ( iy = 0; iy < m_ny; ++iy )
00167     for ( iz = 0; iz < m_nz; ++iz )
00168       m_data( ix, iy, iz ) = -1.0;
00169     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00170   }
00171 
00172   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < npart; ++i, i3=3*i ) {
00173     x = coord[ i3 + 0 ];
00174     y = coord[ i3 + 1 ];
00175     z = coord[ i3 + 2 ];
00176 
00177     ix = unsigned ( x );
00178     iy = unsigned ( y );
00179     iz = unsigned ( z );
00180 
00181     dx = x - ( float ( ix ) );
00182     dy = y - ( float ( iy ) );
00183     dz = z - ( float ( iz ) );
00184 
00185     ix %= m_nx;
00186     iy %= m_ny;
00187     iz %= m_nz;
00188 
00189     tx = 1.0 - dx;
00190     ty = 1.0 - dy;
00191     tz = 1.0 - dz;
00192 
00193     tyw = ty * wpar[ i ];
00194     dyw = dy * wpar[ i ];
00195 
00196     ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % m_nx;
00197     iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % m_ny;
00198     iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % m_nz;
00199 
00200     m_data( ix, iy, iz ) += tz * tx * tyw;
00201     m_data( ix, iy1, iz ) += tz * tx * dyw;
00202     m_data( ix, iy, iz1 ) += dz * tx * tyw;
00203     m_data( ix, iy1, iz1 ) += dz * tx * dyw;
00204 
00205     m_data( ix1, iy, iz ) += tz * dx * tyw;
00206     m_data( ix1, iy1, iz ) += tz * dx * dyw;
00207     m_data( ix1, iy, iz1 ) += dz * dx * tyw;
00208     m_data( ix1, iy1, iz1 ) += dz * dx * dyw;
00209 
00210   }
00211 }
00212 
00213 /* @brief diff2atCIC */
00221 void
00222 ScalarField::diff2atCIC( float *Coord, unsigned nPoints, std::vector< Matrix33 > &t_ij ) {
00223 
00224   ChooseStencil();
00225 
00226   for ( unsigned ip = 0; ip < nPoints; ++ip ) {
00227     int ix = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 0 ] );
00228     int iy = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 1 ] );
00229     int iz = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 2 ] );
00230 
00231     if ( ix > int ( m_nx ) ) {
00232       std::cerr << " * * ERROR: index out of bounds! " << Coord[ 3 * ip ] << std::endl;
00233       ix = m_nx;
00234     }
00235 
00236     int
00237       ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % m_nx,
00238       iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % m_ny,
00239       iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % m_nz;
00240 
00241     float x = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3 * ip + 0 ] );
00242     float y = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3 * ip + 1 ] );
00243     float z = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3 * ip + 2 ] );
00244 
00245     float
00246       cic_dx = x - ( float ) ix;
00247     float cic_dy = y - ( float ) iy;
00248     float cic_dz = z - ( float ) iz;
00249     float cic_tx = 1.0 - cic_dx;
00250     float cic_ty = 1.0 - cic_dy;
00251     float cic_tz = 1.0 - cic_dz;
00252 
00253     float xyz = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00254     float Xyz = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00255     float xYz = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00256     float XYz = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00257     float xyZ = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00258     float XyZ = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00259     float xYZ = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00260     float XYZ = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00261 
00262     Matrix33 t;
00263 
00264     for ( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00265       for ( int j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00266 
00267     float
00268       f_ijk, f_Ijk, f_iJk, f_IJk,
00269       f_ijK, f_IjK, f_iJK, f_IJK;
00270 
00271     float
00272       dy_ijk, dy_Ijk, dy_iJk, dy_IJk,
00273       dy_ijK, dy_IjK, dy_iJK, dy_IJK;
00274 
00275     f_ijk = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz, i, j );
00276     f_Ijk = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz, i, j );
00277     f_iJk = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz, i, j );
00278     f_IJk = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz, i, j );
00279     f_ijK = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz1, i, j );
00280     f_IjK = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz1, i, j );
00281     f_iJK = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00282     f_IJK = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00283 
00284     dy_ijk = f_ijk * xyz;
00285     dy_Ijk = f_Ijk * Xyz;
00286     dy_iJk = f_iJk * xYz;
00287     dy_IJk = f_IJk * XYz;
00288     dy_ijK = f_ijK * xyZ;
00289     dy_IjK = f_IjK * XyZ;
00290     dy_iJK = f_iJK * xYZ;
00291     dy_IJK = f_IJK * XYZ;
00292 
00293     t( i, j ) = dy_ijk + dy_Ijk + dy_iJk + dy_IJk + dy_ijK + dy_IjK + dy_iJK + dy_IJK;
00294       }
00295     t_ij.push_back( t );
00296   }
00297 }
00298 
00299 /* @brief Store tensor field. */
00308 void StoreTensorField( std::string filename, unsigned nPoints, const std::vector<float>& coordinates, const std::vector< Matrix33 > &aTensorField, float SmoothingMassScale ) {
00309 
00310   std::vector< std::vector<float> > tensor;
00311   std::vector<float> eigenvalues,eigenvector1,eigenvector2,eigenvector3;
00312   std::cout << " * * Writing data for " << nPoints << " points to file " << filename.c_str() << "..." << std::endl;
00313 
00314   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i ) {
00315     // tensor and trace-free tensor
00316     std::vector<Vector3> V;
00317     Matrix33 A;
00318     Vector3 lambda;
00319 
00320     std::vector<float> tensortemp, evaltemp, evecttemp;
00321     for ( unsigned k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00322       for ( unsigned l = 0; l <= k; ++l )
00323     tensortemp.push_back( aTensorField[ i ] ( l, k ) );
00324 
00325     A = aTensorField[ i ];
00326         
00327     A.Eigen( lambda, V );
00328 
00329 
00330     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00331             
00332       eigenvalues.push_back( lambda( j ) );
00333       eigenvector1.push_back( (V.at(0))(j) );
00334       eigenvector2.push_back( (V.at(1))(j) );
00335       eigenvector3.push_back( (V.at(2))(j) );
00336     }
00337 
00338     tensor.push_back( tensortemp );
00339         
00340   }
00341 
00342   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Coordinates", coordinates );
00343   HDFWriteDataset2D( filename, "TensorField", tensor );
00344   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Eigenvector_1", eigenvector1 );
00345   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Eigenvector_2", eigenvector2 );
00346   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Eigenvector_3", eigenvector3 );
00347   HDFWriteDatasetVector( filename, "Eigenvalues", eigenvalues );
00348 }

00351 /* @brief Computes the tidal field from a given mass distribution. */
00361 void TidalField( std::string snaphdf5, unsigned N, double Radius, std::string extrahdf5, std::string tensorhdf5 ) {
00362 
00363   std::cout << "TidalField v1.1 - by O. Hahn, P. Steger (ETH Zurich)" << std::endl;
00364   std::cout << "----------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl << std::endl;
00365 
00366   unsigned nParticles = 0;
00367   float boxsize = 0.0f;
00368   std::vector<float> pmass;
00369   std::vector<float> ppos;
00370   std::cout << " * Reading particle properties...";
00371   // attention: what type of particles?
00372   HDFReadGroupAttribute( snaphdf5, "Header", "NumParticles", nParticles );
00373   HDFReadGroupAttribute( snaphdf5, "Header", "Boxsize", boxsize );
00374   HDFReadDataset( snaphdf5, "Data_Mass", pmass );
00375   HDFReadVector( snaphdf5, "Data_Pos", ppos );
00376   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00377   //for(unsigned i=0; i<nParticles; ++i)
00378   //    std::cout<<pmass.at(i)<<std::endl;
00379 
00380   float dx = boxsize / N;
00381   float Omegam0 = 0.25f;
00382   float a = 1.0f;
00383   float H0 = 100.0;
00384   float rho0 = 3.0f * H0 * H0 / 8.0 / M_PI / G_const * Omegam0;
00385   // what's the difference to dx?
00386   float r0 = boxsize / N;
00387   float t0 = 1.0f / H0;
00388   float v0 = r0 / t0;
00389   float phi0 = v0 * v0;
00390 
00391 
00392   // filter size is directly specified, Gaussian
00393   float sigma = Radius / r0;
00394 
00395   std::cout << " * * # particles     = " << nParticles << std::endl;
00396   std::cout << " * * boxsize         = " << boxsize << "kpc/h" << std::endl;
00397   std::cout << " * * smooth @ Radius = " << Radius << "kpc/h" << std::endl;
00398   std::cout << " * * sigma           = " << sigma << std::endl;
00399   std::cout << " * * gridlength N    = " << N << std::endl;
00400   std::cout << " * * r0              = " << r0 << std::endl;
00401   std::cout << " * * dx              = " << dx << std::endl;
00402 
00403   unsigned nx, ny, nz;
00404   nx = ny = nz = N;
00405   // will there be a special simulation where we do need different names for nx, ny, nz at all? no. so just use N instead of nx, ny, nz
00406   const int nstencil = 3;
00407 
00408   ScalarField rho( nx, ny, nz, dx, nstencil );
00409 
00410   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < ppos.size(); ppos[ i ] /= r0, ++i );
00411 
00412   std::cout << " * Putting Cloud in Cell..." << std::endl;
00413   rho.put_CIC<float>( nParticles, &ppos[ 0 ], &pmass[ 0 ] );
00414   std::cout << " * done!" << std::endl;
00415 
00416   PoissonSolver<nstencil> psolver( &rho );
00417   ScalarField phi( nx, ny, nz, dx, nstencil );
00418   std::cout << " * Invoking FFT Poisson solver..." << std::endl;
00419   psolver.solve( &phi, boxsize, sigma );
00420   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00421 
00422   unsigned nhalos;
00423   double nhalos2;
00424 
00425   std::cout << " * Reading Number of Halos..." << std::flush;
00426   HDFReadGroupAttribute( extrahdf5, "Header", "NumHalos", nhalos2 );
00427   nhalos = int( nhalos2 );
00428   std::cout << "gives " << nhalos2 << "=?" << nhalos << ", done!"<<std::endl;
00429   std::cout << " * Reading positions of COM..." << std::flush;
00430   std::vector<float> xcm( 3 * nhalos );
00431   HDFReadVector( extrahdf5, "hp_PosCM", xcm );
00432   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00433 
00434   std::cout << " * Converting coordinates to grid units...";
00435   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3*nhalos; ++i )
00436     xcm.at( i ) /= r0;
00437   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00438 
00439   HDFCreateFile( tensorhdf5 );
00440 
00441   std::cout << " * Computing tensor components at given positions...";
00442   std::vector< Matrix33 > tij_cm;
00443   // dphi.diff_at( tij_cm, xcm, nhalos, boxsize );
00444   phi.diff2atCIC( &xcm[ 0 ], nhalos, tij_cm );
00445   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00446 
00447   std::cout << " * Converting back to physical units...";
00448   float tnorm = 1.0 / ( 1.5 * Omegam0 / a );
00449   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nhalos; ++i )
00450     for ( int j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00451       for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00452     ( tij_cm[ i ] ) ( j, k ) *= tnorm;
00453   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00454 
00455   StoreTensorField( tensorhdf5, nhalos, xcm, tij_cm, sigma );
00456 
00457   std::cout << " * Evaluating density field at given positions..." << std::endl;
00458   std::vector< float > datacm;
00459 
00460   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nhalos; ++i )
00461     datacm.push_back( ( rho.get_CIC( xcm.at( 3 * i + 0 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 1 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 2 ) ) + 1.0 ) * rho0 / ( a * a * a ));
00462 
00463   HDFWriteDataset( tensorhdf5, "Density", datacm );
00464   datacm.clear();
00465 
00466   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nhalos; ++i )
00467     datacm.push_back( rho.get_CIC( xcm.at( 3 * i + 0 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 1 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 2 ) ));
00468 
00469   HDFWriteDataset( tensorhdf5, "Overdensity", datacm );
00470   datacm.clear();
00471 
00472   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nhalos; ++i )
00473     datacm.push_back( rho.get_CIC( xcm.at( 3 * i + 0 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 1 ), xcm.at( 3 * i + 2 ) ) * phi0);
00474 
00475   HDFWriteDataset( tensorhdf5, "Potential", datacm );
00476   datacm.clear();
00477 }
00478 
00479 void TidalField( unsigned isnap, int N, double Radius ) {
00480   for(unsigned i=1; i<11; ++i){
00481     std::string snaphdf5 = Folder("output") + Snaps( isnap ) + "/snapshot.hdf5";
00482     std::string extrahdf5 = Folder("output") + Snaps( isnap ) +"/extra.hdf5";
00483     std::string tensorhdf5 = Folder("output") + Snaps( isnap ) +"/tensor_" + IntToString(i) + ".hdf5";
00484     std::cout << snaphdf5 << std::endl;
00485     std::cout << extrahdf5 << std::endl;
00486     std::cout << tensorhdf5 << std::endl;
00487     TidalField( snaphdf5, N, i*Radius, extrahdf5, tensorhdf5 );
00488   }
00489 }
